data.headline: Warriors fans pack S.F. for parade awash in confetti and righted wrongs

After two tough seasons, Steph Curry and his teammates rode victorious along Market Street with their families, sometimes jumping off double-decker buses to high-five fans who packed a downtown parade route largely silenced by the pandemic.
Did Klay Thompson really drop one of his title rings during the parade?
Thompson has earned a reputation as a deadly outside shooter and a quirky character off the court. On Monday, during the team’s victory parade down Market Street, Klay added to his loony legacy.
